data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lin, Xiaolong, Qi, Xin, Zhang, Ruilei, Wang, Xinhua (2013): A new species of Polypedilum (Uresipedilum) Oyewo & Saether, 1998 from Zhejiang Province of Oriental China (Diptera, Chironomidae). ZooKeys 320: 43-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.320.5147, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.320.5147
